sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../../actions/authActions' const LoginScreen = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=> { }, []) const loginButton = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(username, password)) } return ( <>

Login to Sandbox

setUsername(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Forgot Password?

) } export default LoginScreen
